misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his seventh appearance in the upcoming 2025 tournament. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami is known for his steady play and unwavering determination on the course.

Though the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Sami's consistent presence in the competition speaks volumes about his commitment to the sport and his competitive spirit. He has participated in 6 previous Hector Trophée tournaments, and his experience will undoubtedly be a valuable asset in the upcoming event.

Beyond the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour, achieving commendable results. He is known to be a very thoughtful player, who likes to take his time when planning his shots.
